data.title: Turn 10 Studios News - Pure Xbox

News Forza Motorsport Splits Update 10 Into Two Parts As Team 'Works Through' New Content

Update 10 is a little different

Last month's Forza Motorsport update delivered sweeping changes to the game's visuals, and while not all of the content for Update 10 has been revealed yet, the team has explained that things will work a little differently this time around. The game's July update will begin rolling out tomorrow, but that will only be...

News Forza Motorsport Gets Big Visual Upgrade On Xbox In Update 9

The lighting looks completely different!

Earlier this month, Turn 10 Studios dropped Forza Motorsport Update 9, which came complete with a free DLC offer on Xbox and PC. However, one other difference that flew under the radar was a pretty big upgrade to the game's visuals - the dev team has made some massive graphical changes in Update 9. We've...

News Forza Motorsport Hotfix Patches Up HDR Issues On Xbox Series X|S

Update 6.1 is out now

Roughly a week on from Turn 10 dropping its big progression overhaul update for Forza Motorsport, the team has applied a small hotfix to the Xbox racer. Patch 6.1, which is now live on Xbox and PC, fixes some HDR issues across all platforms - alongside making some other minor tweaks to the game. We'll drop the full patch notes...

"Here’s what we’ve heard from you"

Ever since launch, the Forza Motorsport studio has been hard at work adding new tracks, cars and features to the game - which have been welcome because it did feel a little light in certain aspects on day one. Trackside details gets a big bump

Forza Motorsport's first post-launch track is officially here, with the returning 'Yas Marina' circuit making its Xbox Series X|S debut. The multiplayer stats are looking quite low

Forza Motorsport has been out in early access for a couple of weeks now; giving players plenty of time to get stuck into everything Turn 10's new Xbox racer has to offer. Turn 10 Studios has been working away on its grand Forza Motorsport reboot for more than five years at this point, and we're still none the wiser on when the game is coming out. News Forza Street Is Closing Down For Good In Spring 2022

Road closed

Forza Street, the mobile-centric spinoff to the Forza series, is officially shutting down this Spring. The title initially released in 2018 on PC, before expanding to iOS and Android devices in 2020. The Forza Motorsport support page details the closure, and what players can expect in the run up to the game's final hour. Forza Street's...

News The Forza Motorsport Series Began 15 Years Ago Today

On the original Xbox

Happy birthday Forza Motorsport! The iconic racing series first debuted on the original Xbox in North America back on May 3rd, 2005. The original Forza was a massive success and one of the highest-rated titles on the system, earning a fantastic Metacritic score of 92/100. It wasn't all smooth sailing for the first game in the...

Microsoft just revealed its big Forza Motorsport 4 Limited Collector's Edition, containing 25 extra cars and a stack of other additions to convince you to part with your hard-earned £59.99.
